patterns: how can I apply to Al Shorouk Academy?
can I schedule a tour of Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: You can apply to Al Shorouk Academy through our website or by visiting our admissions office. The admission requirements are listed on our website. The application deadline is [insert date here]. You can schedule a tour by contacting our admissions office.

patterns: what programs does Al Shorouk Academy offer?
can you tell me more about Al Shorouk Academy's programs?
responses: Al Shorouk Academy offers a variety of programs in [insert fields here]. You can find more information about our programs on our website. The program requirements are also listed on our website.

patterns: does Al Shorouk Academy offer scholarships?
what are the scholarship options at Al Shorouk Academy?
how can I apply for a scholarship at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: Yes, Al Shorouk Academy offers scholarships to eligible students. You can find more information about our scholarship options on our website. The application process for scholarships is also listed on our website.

patterns: what is student life like at Al Shorouk Academy?
are there any student clubs or organizations at Al Shorouk Academy?
what extracurricular activities are available at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: Student life at Al Shorouk Academy is vibrant and diverse. We have a variety of student clubs and organizations that you can join, and there are many extracurricular activities available, such as [insert activities here]. You can find more information about student life on our website.

patterns: who are the faculty members at Al Shorouk Academy?
can you tell me more about Al Shorouk Academy's faculty?
what are the research interests of the faculty at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: The faculty members at Al Shorouk Academy are highly qualified and experienced in their fields. You can find more information about our faculty on our website. The research interests of our faculty are also listed on our website.

patterns: What courses does Al Shorouk Academy offer?
Can you give me an overview of the courses offered at Al Shorouk Academy?
What are the popular courses at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: Al Shorouk Academy offers a wide range of courses across various disciplines such as business, engineering, computer science, and more. Our courses are designed to provide students with practical skills and knowledge that can be applied in the real world. You can find more details on our website or contact our admissions team.

patterns: What is the campus like at Al Shorouk Academy?
Can you describe the facilities and amenities available on the Al Shorouk Academy campus?
What are the campus life and student activities like at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: Al Shorouk Academy has a modern and well-equipped campus with state-of-the-art facilities and amenities. We have spacious classrooms, laboratories, libraries, sports facilities, and more. We also have a vibrant student community with various clubs and activities that provide opportunities for personal and professional growth. You can find more details on our website or contact our admissions team.

patterns: Does Al Shorouk Academy offer online learning programs?
Can you tell me more about the online courses offered at Al Shorouk Academy?
What are the benefits of online learning at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: Yes, Al Shorouk Academy offers online learning programs that provide students with the flexibility to study from anywhere and at any time. Our online courses are designed to deliver high-quality education through engaging and interactive content.

patterns: Does Al Shorouk Academy offer STEM programs?
responses: STEM education focuses on science, technology, engineering, and mathematics. Yes, Al Shorouk Academy offers a range of STEM programs that prepare students for careers in these fields.

patterns: Does Al Shorouk Academy offer language programs?
What languages can I learn at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: Yes, Al Shorouk Academy offers a variety of language programs, including Arabic, English, French, and Spanish.

patterns: How much does it cost to attend Al Shorouk Academy?
What is the tuition fee at Al Shorouk Academy?
Can you tell me about the financial aid options at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: The tuition fee at Al Shorouk Academy varies depending on the grade level and program of study. We offer a range of financial aid options, including scholarships and discounts for siblings and early enrollment. For more information about the tuition fees and financial aid options, please visit our website or contact our admissions office.

patterns: What extracurricular activities does Al Shorouk Academy offer?
Can you tell me about the sports programs at Al Shorouk Academy?
Are there any music or art classes at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: At Al Shorouk Academy, we offer a wide range of extracurricular activities, including sports teams, music and art classes, robotics and coding clubs, and community service opportunities. We believe that extracurricular activities are an important part of the overall educational experience, and encourage our students to get involved in a variety of activities outside of the classroom.

patterns: What kind of facilities does Al Shorouk Academy have for students?
Can you tell me about the library at Al Shorouk Academy?
What sports facilities are available to students at Al Shorouk Academy?
responses: Al Shorouk Academy has a variety of facilities available to students, including a library, sports facilities, and student lounges. You can find more information on our website or contact our admissions office for specific details.

patterns: What are the career prospects for graduates of Al Shorouk Academy?
Can you tell me about the job placement rate?
What industries do graduates typically work in?
What kind of jobs do graduates get?
How does Al Shorouk Academy prepare students for their careers?
responses: Al Shorouk Academy has a strong track record of producing successful graduates who are well-prepared for their careers. Our graduates have gone on to work in a wide range of industries, including healthcare, technology, education, and more. We offer career services and internships to help students gain practical experience and make connections in their field.

patterns: What are some effective study tips?
How can I improve my study habits?
Do you have any advice for studying better?
What are some study techniques that work?
How can I stay focused while studying?
responses: Sure, here are some study tips: make a schedule, create a study environment, take breaks, use active learning techniques, and test yourself regularly.

patterns: The teacher should have uploaded materials in the class I am taking, but I cannot find any materials on the course.
I cannot find the uploaded material.
I cannot see the teacher's materials.
responses:
If you cannot find the documents, please check the following points.


1. Make sure that you are enrolled in the course corresponding to the subject. Usually, you are registered for the course once you applied for the registration. You cannot use the documents before the registration.
2. Ask the teacher in charge of the class to confirm that the availability period of the data is set correctly.

patterns: I put the material on my page but students cannot see it.
How can I prevent the students from seeing any materials on documents stored for the subjects of the previous semester?
responses:
1. Please make sure that the documents have been posted to the courses for this fiscal year that correspond to the subjects, not my page. Documents posted on My Page cannot be used except for yourself.
2. Make sure that there are no other courses offered on the same day of the week, time, or class. If you do not consolidate subjects, students may have registered for another subject.
3. Make sure that folders and files are not hidden. If it is hidden, students cannot use it.
4. By setting the availability period of folders and files, you can set the use restriction to students. Make sure that this availability period is set correctly. Students cannot use documents that are out of period.

patterns: I want to notify students when I upload the document file.
What is the function of notifying students about file uploads?
Can the teacher set the notification function?
Can only some students be notified about uploaded materials?
Can only the specified student group be informed of the publication of materials?
responses: The instructor in charge of each class can set whether or not to notify by e-mail when creating or uploading documents. Even if the student wants to be notified, the notification will not be received unless the teacher in charge of the class sets it. In addition, by using the group function, it is possible to disclose and notify documents and notices to only some students. In addition, even if it is the document uploaded to the folder set to hide, if you set it to (notify), an email will be sent to the students stating that (folders and files have been prepared).

patterns: Can I set a password for documents?
I want to set the file to open with password authentication.
Can I upload files with password settings?
responses: The system does not have a function to set a password for a file. The files will be disclosed to all students, but if you want to make them available only to some students, you can use the group settings to make them available only to specific students. Another option is to upload an encrypted file, and only let some students know their password.

patterns: I want to share the material with all students .
I want to distribute class materials
I want to pass files to students
I would like to disclose class slides to students .
Can we disclose lesson materials to students?
responses: It is possible by using (document) function.

patterns: Can some students set resubmission settings?
I would like to resubmit only the student who submitted the poor task.
I would like to have students who submit incomplete assignments resubmit.
Can I resubmit the assignment after the final acceptance date?
I have set the resubmission settings for specific students, but they will not be reflected in the overall final acceptance date. Can students resubmit in this state?
After the deadline, it seems that the resubmission is not possible, but can I do it?
responses: Even after the deadline, it is possible for the teacher to request specific students to resubmit. The final acceptance date and time set in the resubmission setting will be reflected only for the student, and will not be reflected in the overall final acceptance date.

patterns: Can I modify the submission deadline after the final acceptance date?
I want to be able to submit again the assignments that have been published in the past.
Can I edit the submission deadline and reset it for submission?
I would like to change the deadline so that students can submit the task once again
Can I change the deadline after the deadline?
responses: It is possible by changing the deadline

patterns: Files submitted in the past will be updated.
When a student resubmits an assignment, is it overwritten if the file name is the same?
I want to keep the previously submitted file.
Can I save a file with the same name without overwriting it?
Can I save the submitted file as an alias?
responses: If the file name is the same, an overwrite confirmation message will be displayed, and the file will be overwritten if submitted as it is. If you want to submit as a separate file, please change the file name beforehand and submit.

patterns: No notification about the assignment has arrived.
I would like to send a notification email to myself (teacher)
Can I notify that I changed the content of the assignment?
I would like to inform students the change in assignment
I want to be notified of the addition of an assignment
responses: The teachers in each class can set whether to be notified by e-mail when the addition or modification of the assignment is posted or the notification is posted. Even if the student wants to be notified, the notification will not be received unless the teacher in charge of the class sets it. In addition, since the assignment submission authority is granted to teachers as a standard, notification emails will also be sent to teachers if notifications such as adding tasks are set.

patterns: I cannot submit an assignment even after the assignment deadline has been adjusted.
The deadline for the assignment is not working
The submission was completed even after the date and time of the assignment.
Can I submit delayed submissions more than once?
responses: Assignments can be submitted repeatedly until the final acceptance date. In addition, even if the deadline has been extended, if it has already been evaluated, it cannot be submitted for replacement.

patterns: Please let me know how to get the grade list of the assignment.
Evaluated grades for the task are not reflected in the gradebook.
I want to know the submission status of the assignment.
I want to reflect my  grades
When will the grade results be reflected in the gradebook?
responses: In order to reflect the scoring results for the assignment in the gradebook, it is first necessary to select 'Add an assignment to gradebook' when creating the assignment. Next, scoring results will be reflected in the gradebook by scoring the submitted assignments and returning them to the students. In addition, you can use the 'Submission Status List' to know the submission status of assignments and the scoring results in a list. The submission status list can also be downloaded as an Excel file.

patterns: I cannot see the assignments submitted by the students.
Can't you score the question before the deadline?
Can student's submissions to assignments not be batch downloaded until the deadline date?
I created an assignment that imposed text description and file attachment, but I cannot confirm the text content written by the student.
responses: Students may replace their submissions until the deadline, so it is not possible to review or score submissions of assignments prior to the deadline ,  You can change the deadline settings , or use a 'Test/Questionnaire' substitute that can be checked before the deadline.

patterns: The registered student has been tentatively registered, is there any difference from this registration?
A research student has not been registered for the course.
Several students are not connected to class.
Do graduate students need to apply for additional rights ?
I would like to add students to the class .
A user whose user information has not been set is registered.
Materials are not uploaded because TA is not registered for the course.
responses:
For students who have applied for the course, the course status of the 'Class Information' function will be displayed as 'Full Registration'. On the other hand, if the teacher manually registers the student or if the student is registered for the course by self-registration, 'provisional registration' is displayed. You can use the kibaco course even for provisionally registration, but you cannot earn credits if you do not apply separately.
In the following cases, students will remain tentatively registered.
1. Non-regular students such as course students and research students. If it is necessary to change the display to this registration, from the teacher in charge of office work or classes such as the education affairs division or the international affairs division system management room 2 (replace with an at-mark of e-learning-ml ml.tmu.tc.jp).
2. If you create a course on kibaco that is not registered in the clerical information system.

When registering a student as a 'TA/Tutor', give 'TA/Tutor' authority when registering a student in 'Register Students or TA' of 'Class Information' function.

patterns: Are students who have been provisionally enrolled in the  course will not be erased as provisionally registered even after the course application period is over?
I cannot cancel classes I do not register .
Can the teacher delete a student who has been temporarily registered?
I am tentatively registered student but I want to withdraw.
I would like to cancel the course without registering it
responses:
If a provisionally registered student applies for a course, it will be changed to full registration the next day. If a provisionally registered student does not apply for the course, it will remain provisionally registered even after the course application period. Class teachers can unregister students from the course for provisionally registration. However, in the following cases, students are still provisionally registered even if they have applied for the course.
1. Non-regular students such as course students and research students. If it is necessary to change the display to this registration, the teacher in charge of the class or office workers of the education affairs division or the international affairs division contacts system management room 2 (replace with an at-mark of e-learning-ml ml.tmu.ac.jp).
2. If you create a course on kibaco that is not registered in the clerical information system.
Students who are officially registered will be canceled from the course only if the students withdraw from the course application.

patterns: The student tried to self-register for the subject but could not self-register for some subjects.
Can't find course from self-registration screen
A research student cannot self-register in a subject.
I want students to have access to kibaco subjects before completing the course registration.
responses: By enrolling students in courses that correspond to the subjects, students can gain access to the courses even before applying for courses. One of the registration methods is to allow students to self-registration and make them do it for the course. The teacher in charge of each class can set whether or not to self-register for the course. Even if the student wants to self-register, he/she cannot do self-registration unless the teacher in charge of the class sets it. In addition, first-year undergraduate students cannot use kibaco until they take an information ethics class in the first class of the Information Literacy Practice I/IA.

patterns: I would like to cancel the registration from the subject I self-registered.
Students who were allowed to self-register but who did not register for the course are still provisionally registered. Are there any problems with deleting students?
I would like to cancel my registration, so I want to cancel my registration.
I would like to know how to cancel the registration of secondary courses
responses: If you apply for a course that you have self-registered, withdrawal from the course application will cancel your registration from the course. In addition, if you do not apply for courses you have registered for self-registration, you can cancel your self-registration by yourself. However, if the teacher in charge of the class consolidates the courses and the self-registered course is a secondary course, the course application will not be canceled even if the course application is withdrawn.

patterns: Are there any ways for teachers in charge of course consolidation?
Please tell me how to apply for intensive subjects
I would like to put together classes at the same time with kibaco (I want to consolidate the subjects)
After subject consolidation, will the test created in the main subject be copied to the secondary subject?
I want to combine multiple tabs into one.
responses: a course (class tab) is created for each class number. Even if the courses are offered on the same day of the week, time limit, or classroom, the course is divided into multiple courses in the case that different course numbers are assigned depending on the year of entry or affiliation (undergraduate or graduate school). If you are teaching a course that is divided into multiple courses as essentially the same course, you can organize those courses by applying. This process of summarizing is called subject concentration. By consolidating the courses, you will be able to manage lesson materials, manage student scoring results, etc. with one designated main course. The processing applied to the main subject course is not reflected in the secondary subject course.

patterns: I would like to cancel the consolidation of subjects.
responses: If you consolidate the subjects, you cannot cancel them.

patterns: If I look at the schedule, there are two classes on the same day and time
The same course is displayed twice in the kibaco timetable.
When I registered as a teacher for a class course, there were two classes on the same day and the same time period.
Multiple classes are displayed on the exact same date and time.
There are multiple classes displayed on the same day of the week, what should I do?
responses: A course will be created for each class number. Even if the courses are offered on the same day of the week, time limit, or class, the course is divided into multiple courses in the case that different class numbers are assigned depending on the year of admission or affiliation (undergraduate or graduate school). It is possible to combine the subjects into one.
